data.title: Dries van der Lof
data.meta_description: Dries van der Lof, Formula 1 driver in 1952. Discover season stats and career highlights from their time in F1.
data.text:
Dries van der Lof is a Dutch Formula 1 driver born on August 23, 1919. The first race Dries van der Lof drove was the 1952 Dutch Grand Prix. Since then Van der Lof has driven 1 races in total.

In these 1 races, Van der Lof won 0 races, finshed on the podium 0 times and scored a total of 0 points. The 1952 Dutch Grand Prix was the last race Van der Lof has entered.

Dries ended his career driving for Hersham and Walton Motors.
